programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: (2001) World War II thriller. Cate Blanchett stars as a secret agent sent to occupied France to aid the Resistance against the Nazis. But she has her own agenda. With Michael Gambon.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: (2002) Action-thriller starring Jason Statham. For a price, an underworld courier will deliver people or packages anywhere, no questions asked. But one job lands him in deep danger.

programme.title: Bob Trevino Likes It
programme.desc: (2024) Tracie Laymon's bitter-sweet comedy drama stars Barbie Ferreira as a young woman who meets a man with the same name as her useless father and spots the opportunity for a reset...

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Smallest Show On Earth
programme.desc: (1957) Comedy with Bill Travers and Virginia McKenna as a couple who inherit a dilapidated fleapit cinema, along with its equally dilapidated staff: Peter Sellers, Margaret Rutherford.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: (1995) Mel Gibson stars in this Oscar-laden epic as William Wallace - Scottish freedom fighter, rousing orator and keen face painter - who led his army into England, threatening the throne.

programme.title: The Mission
programme.desc: (1986) Award-winning epic with Robert De Niro and Jeremy Irons. A Jesuit priest and a reformed slave trader forge an alliance to protect Indigenous South Americans from colonial Portugal.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: (1967) Julie Christie and Terence Stamp star in John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's novel. Bathsheba is not short of suitors, but will marrying any of them lead to happiness?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: (2022) It's Predator, 1719 style. Amber Midthunder stars as a Comanche hunter who must save her tribe from an extraterrestrial threat in this action prequel. If it bleeds, you can kill it.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi horror-comedy with John Boyega. Aggressive aliens unwisely pick a tough London estate as the beachhead for their invasion. But the locals are no pushovers...

programme.title: Save Yourselves!
programme.desc: (2020) Gentle apocalypse comedy with Sunita Mani and John Reynolds. An NYC hipster couple go cold turkey from their tech in the sticks. But while they're off grid, cute furry aliens invade.

programme.title: Lola
programme.desc: (2022) Lo-fi sci-fi. In 1940, two sisters invent a contraption that intercepts future broadcasts. But it inadvertently creates an alternate timeline in which the Nazis win the war. Oops.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: (1984) John Carpenter's sci-fi romance with Jeff Bridges and Karen Allen. An alien is stranded on Earth, where he assumes the form of a widow's dead husband - and finds the locals hostile.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: Le Mans '66
programme.desc: (2019) Oscar-winning sports drama starring Matt Damon and Christian Bale. In the 60s, Ford set out to build a car that can defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans race.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: (2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Scorsese's epic drama with Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel Day-Lewis and Cameron Diaz. As gang warfare dominates 1860s New York, an orphan seeks revenge against his father's killer.

programme.title: Straightheads
programme.desc: (2007) Thriller starring Gillian Anderson and Danny Dyer. On their way to a party in the country, a couple are brutally attacked by thugs. Months later, they set out for gory vengeance.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.desc: One Pony Town: US documentary series. Mike Wolff and Frank Fritz inspect a collector's weird objects and stuffed animals, and a cuddly horse is given an impressive valuation. S2 Ep8

programme.title: Sharpe
programme.desc: Sharpe's Revenge: Action-adventure series. The Peninsula War is finally over for Britain and her allies, but the drama does not end here for Sharpe as he is framed by an old foe. S5 Ep1

programme.title: Sharpe
programme.desc: Sharpe's Justice: Action-adventure series. Sharpe returns to England with his reputation restored and is ordered to the north of England to command a troublesome local militia force. S5 Ep2

programme.title: 2025 FIM World Superbike Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The premier production-based motorcycle championship on the planet featuring the fastest 1000cc models piloted by international level riders competing in a 12-round championship across the globe.

programme.title: Australian Superbike Championship
programme.desc: Since 1980, this championship has developed Australia's best road racers as they aspire to follow in the footsteps of legendary riders such as Troy Corser, Mat Mladin and Anthony Gobert.

programme.title: 2025 FIM Speedway Highlights
programme.desc: With four riders battling for 4 short laps per race, patience goes out the window and competitors are not afraid to get their elbows out, bang bars and throw aggressive passes for the win.

programme.title: King of the Roads
programme.desc: With riders racing through city streets on 200mph motorcycles with no margin for error, this series is the ultimate test for adrenaline junkies who are looking for the biggest thrill in motorsports.

programme.title: 2025 Isle of Man
programme.desc: Five classes. Ten races. Thirty-seven miles around one small island. Drivers risk it all at every one of the 200 dangerous turns chasing glory at speeds topping 200MPH in one of the most prestigious and challenging road races in the world.

programme.title: RACER Debrief
programme.desc: Three generations of Unsers have earned 26 overall wins at The Race to the Clouds, and now a fourth-generation Unser, Loni, is looking to make her mark on the Colorado mountain, too. As she gets ready to ascend the 14,110ft peak for a fourth time, June 22, Loni joins the RACER Debrief to talk about her journey to racing at Pikes Peak, her 2025 program with BBI, Mobil 1 and Porsche, and the challenge of taking on one of motorsports' most memorable and unique events.

programme.title: Prodigy Racing League
programme.desc: Drafted by Williams, G2, Guild, BS+, SuckerPunch, and Thibaut Courtois, 30 of the world's best gamers, from 100K+ who entered season 1, battle in the Prodigy Racing League. Only 20 advance to the next PRL series. This is the future of motorsports.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: Classic Auto Rides puts on their annual car show in beautiful Buford, GA.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to Arizona for the Tucson Classics Car Show.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey continues to fit the old '40 Chevy body on the new replacement frame; He rolls in the Mighty Mite for some simple fuel system upgrades.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: The 1955 Bel Air gets its new engine and transmission installed.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam - Arena in 30
programme.desc: Jon Zimmer Jr. continues his season as he takes on Krazy Train in Moline.

programme.title: 2025 Inside Monster Jam
programme.desc: The JCB Racing World Finals Champion reflects on his career, going out on top and earning Monster Jam's Lifetime Achievement Award.

programme.title: Australian Superbike Championship
programme.desc: Since 1980, this championship has developed Australia's best road racers as they aspire to follow in the footsteps of legendary riders such as Troy Corser, Mat Mladin and Anthony Gobert.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: From race winner to race-winning strategist, Bryan Herta joins former competitor Paul Tracy for an open conversation on their open-wheel history, his venture into IMSA with Bryan Herta Autosport and seeing son Colton carry on his Hertamania legacy.

programme.title: Racers Unchained

programme.title: My Classic Car

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey kicks it up a notch and moves on to a level two restoration, including mechanical and cosmetic, on an old Jeepster.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
